text: Dina Merrill (December 29, 1923 - May 22, 2017) was an American actress, socialite, businesswoman and philanthropist. She is known for her roles in Operation Petticoat, The Sundowners, BUtterfield 8, The Courtship of Eddie's Father, and in Caddyshack II. Merrill died on May 22, 2017 at her East Hampton, New York home from dementia at the age of 93.Dina Merrill, Actress and Philanthropist, Dies at 93 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:Disease-related deaths in New York (state) Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American philanthropists Category:Actors from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City
title: Dina Merrill
